title: HPE security advisory (AV26-110)
description: On February 10, 2026, HPE published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: HPE Aruba Networking Private 5G Core  versions 1.24.3.0, 1.24.3.1, 1.24.3.2 and 1.24.3.3
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
